name: WPDevDesign – Oxygen – Rank Math Integration
author: Sridhar Katakam

sections.description:
This plugin enables Rank Math SEO plugin for WordPress to parse text inside the Oxygen editor for Pages and Posts.

There are no settings for the plugin.

Just install and activate to make Rank Math include Oxygen editor content in its content analysis.

Note: For the updated/correct SEO score that includes the Oxygen editor content to be shown on Page/Post List screen, update the Page/Post.

Automatic Installation

Search for rank math oxygen from within your WordPress plugins’ Add New page and install.

Manual Installation

  1. Click on the Download button to download the plugin.
  2. Upload the entire wpdevdesign-rankmath-integration-for-oxygen folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
sections.changelog:
1.1 – January 03, 2020

Updated to account for new changes introduced in version 1.0.36 of Rank Math. Details: https://www.facebook.com/groups/rankmathseopluginwordpress/permalink/505120940360237/.

1.0

Initial Release.
